pageProduct.name: Andalou Lemon Sugar Facial Scrub 50g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Fruit stem cell complex with argan stem cells, manuka oil, agave and organic cane sugar gently exfoliate dull, dry surface cells for improved tone and texture as meyer lemon refreshes and revitalizes for a bright, balanced complexion.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Facial Scrub For Active & Oily Skin Types

Ingredients

Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Juice*, Vegetable Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Lecithin, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Tocopherol, Manihot Esculenta (Tapioca) Root Starch, Manuka Honey, Oleic Acid, Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Extract*, Fruit Stem Cells (Argan, Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Cyamopsis Tetragonolobus (Guar) Gum*, Decyl Glucodise, Cetearyl Glucoside, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Vanilla Isolates, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil*, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil* *Certified Organic Ingredients Fair Trade Ingredients

Directions

Gently massage small amount of scrub on damp face and neck. Avoid eye and lip area. Rinse clean with cool water.
